title: Indian Oil Quarterly Results and Dividend Announcement for Q4 2025
summary: Indian Oil Corporation is set to announce its Q4 2025 results and dividend details. The announcement comes amid active trading sessions in the Indian stock market, with other major companies like ICICI Bank and HDFC Bank also declaring their quarterly dividends.
content:
The Indian stock market is anticipating the quarterly results and dividend announcement from Indian Oil Corporation for Q4 2025. The announcement follows a series of dividend declarations from other major Indian corporations.

ICICI Bank has reported an 18% year-on-year profit increase in their Q4 results, while HDFC Bank has announced a dividend of Rs 22 per share. Market analysts are closely watching these developments as they may impact overall market sentiment.

The banking sector has shown particular strength, with the Nifty closing at 23,851. Investors are adjusting their strategies based on these corporate announcements and market movements.

source.title: Indian Oil dividend announcement in Q4 results 2025; announcement date, schedule fixed | Quarterly earnings

markdown_content:
## Market Outlook

The Indian stock market is anticipating the quarterly results and dividend announcement from Indian Oil Corporation for Q4 2025. The announcement follows a series of dividend declarations from other major Indian corporations.

## Banking Sector Performance

* ICICI Bank has reported an 18% year-on-year profit increase in their Q4 results
* HDFC Bank has announced a dividend of ₹22 per share

Market analysts are closely watching these developments as they may impact overall market sentiment.

## Market Update

The banking sector has shown particular strength, with the Nifty closing at 23,851. Investors are adjusting their strategies based on these corporate announcements and market movements.
